5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Sa’eed bin Yasar said:“I was with Ibn ‘Umar and I lagged behind and prayed Witr. He said: ‘What kept you?’ I said: ‘I was praying Witr.’ He said: ‘Do you not have the best of examples in the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ)?’ I said: ‘Of course.’ He said: ‘The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to pray Witr while riding his camel.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوِتْرِ عَلَى الرَّاحِلَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Witr while riding
